title: Handle a Sponsorship Inquiry
description: A local company inquires about sponsorship opportunities at the venue, such as signage or naming rights.

tasks.description: Receive the inquiry and gather basic information about the company and their budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the new lead in the CRM.

tasks.description: Send the company the venue's standard sponsorship deck, which details available opportunities and pricing.
Assign the lead to a corporate sales manager for follow-up.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the lead to the appropriate sales rep.
